description.lang: It is mains powered and always listening so is capable of acting as a repeater in Z-Wave network. It supports on/off and dim up/down control of two groups.2 GANG MAINS CONTROLLER MODULESTANDARD CARTON QUANTITY: 1RF Range up to 75m (open field)Can control up to 64 devices in totalCan control either a group or a scenePre programmed with ALL OFF function and HOLIDAY MODE functionMains poweredMounting Boxes:Flush 35mm
